name: CanRun Universal Game Compatibility Checker
description: PRIMARY FUNCTION: Analyze if games can run on your system. ALWAYS use this plugin when users ask: 'Can I run [game]?', 'Will [game] work?', 'Can my PC handle [game]?', 'Does my system meet requirements for [game]?', or mention specific games like Diablo 4, Cyberpunk 2077, etc. Provides S-A-B-C-D-F tier performance analysis with FPS predictions.
author: CanRun Development Team

functions.name: detect_hardware
functions.description: Detect and analyze system hardware specifications including GPU, CPU, RAM, and RTX/DLSS capabilities

functions.name: check_compatibility
functions.description: PRIMARY COMPATIBILITY FUNCTION - ALWAYS call this function when users ask about running games. Triggers: 'Can I run', 'Will work', 'Can my PC handle', 'Does my system support', 'Will run', 'system requirements', 'compatible with', 'run on my computer', 'my PC can run', 'able to play', 'system handle', 'requirements met', plus ANY specific game names (Diablo 4, Diablo IV, Cyberpunk 2077, Elden Ring, Call of Duty, etc.). Returns S-A-B-C-D-F tier performance rating with detailed compatibility analysis.

game_name.description: Name of the game to check compatibility for (e.g. Diablo 4, Cyberpunk 2077, Elden Ring)

functions.name: predict_performance
functions.description: Predict detailed game performance with S-A-B-C-D-F tier analysis for specific graphics settings and resolutions. Use when users ask about FPS, performance tiers, or specific graphics settings.

functions.name: get_optimization_suggestions
functions.description: Get optimization recommendations and settings advice for better game performance. Use when users ask about improving performance, optimization tips, or DLSS/RTX settings.

functions.name: get_intelligent_analysis
functions.description: Get comprehensive G-Assist LLM-powered analysis including bottleneck analysis, optimization recommendations, and deep system analysis. Use for complex performance questions or detailed system analysis.

game_name.description: Name of the game to analyze

functions.name: ask_intelligent_question
functions.description: Ask an intelligent question about gaming performance using G-Assist embedded LLM. Use for open-ended gaming performance questions or complex queries.

query.description: The question to ask about gaming performance

game_name.description: Name of the game for context
